formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetCallerID' =-
[Synopsis] Set CallerID
[Description] SetCallerID(clid[|a]): Set Caller*ID on a call to a new value. Sets ANI as well if a flag is used.
